name: Electric wire
description:
A short puzzlescript game about placing down wire to use it later to push cubes into their intended positions.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=fdf6f3e8167303d9d0d49b687b4340ab

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=fdf6f3e8167303d9d0d49b687b4340ab

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
